reviews.text: Texas State Fence Company - Local Wood Fence Contractors in Richardson, TX
Texas State Fence Company - Local Wood Fence Contractors in Richardson, TX 605 S Sherman St, Richardson, TX 75081
Western Red Cedar Horizontal with a 2x2 open aired gate in Richardson.

"Great customer service and beautiful imaginative work!" "Company owner does not pay his contractual obligations and destroyed our wall." "Patrick was very patient explaining the pricing and process."

Great experience all around. Patrick was very patient explaining the pricing and process. Also very patient with the multiple revisions of the bid. He didnt try to up sale or talk to me into one size over the other.  We went with the 8ft … More Response from the owner 7 months ago Thank you for the review and business Andrew! It was a pleasure.

I got at least 5 quotes from different individuals or fencing companies before I decided to go with Texas State Fence Company.  They went above and beyond to provide us the best deal possible.  Very trustworthy and amazing work.  Absolutely love the fence 100 percent recommend them. Response from the owner 5 months ago Thank you for the business and review Lisa! It was a pleasure.

The entire job was so professional; the scheduling, the workmanship, the attention to detail … The job involved replacing my fence that was severely damaged due to a storm.  The end result is a new fence with even greater curb appeal than my original wood fence.  And it’s better constructed, too.   I highly recommend Texas State Fence! Response from the owner 6 months ago Thank you for the business and review Nancy! It was a pleasure.
